name: Cyberpunkland
description:
Blade City is dirty, dangerous, and violent. Your job is to keep it that way.

The city's hackers and hustlers live in the shadow of the evil corporation Xoxl. As the Hospitality Manager at Xoxl, you must maintain Blade City's grim and antisocial atmosphere — giving residents a hip, gritty vacation from a soul-numbing late capitalist reality.

Written and designed by Adi Robertson, art and visual design by Alex Castro and William Joel.
